post.body: Haha, thanks. It is a cool shot, but they are amazing when they fly past...
http://twitpic.com/uywr - I love coffee with you...and I love the zebra cup:)
What's next is actual communication with people. Talking with people in person will revolutionize the world.
That is crazy ass post...haha!
That is some Irish Cream...I don't really drink, but I love this in the cold winter weather! Cheers:)
cheers to you bra!
Tuner is dead! Damn it!
Hello Lucia! I would like to get my album(s) on Pandora...suggestions? Happy Holidays:)
It is always great to play! Although I have way more fun playing long gigs with the band. That way I can be more in the moment!
In Idaho...and it is chilly here!
Hope you can make it...it will be SICK!

Drinking great coffee and getting ready to sit in the hot tub while it is snowing!! A badass Goshawk just flew by the house:
Trying to figure out Facebook. Hello friends, new and old:)
